casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the Application of the TOWNSHIP OF SOUTH BRUNSWICK, County of Middlesex. M-451/452 September Term 2017
080180 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 8, 2017

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the South Brunswick Township Planning Board for leave to file a motion for leave t( appeal as within time (M-451) is granted and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal (M-452) is denied.
